publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-5624 Nicol Stephen: The Draft Renewables Obligation (Scotland) Order 2007—That the Enterprise and Culture Committee recommends that the draft Renewables Obligation (Scotland) Order 2007 be approved. Supported by: Allan Wilson*
